replies.body:
Were you the one who deleted the thread?  I was just looking for the thread this morning, and was surprised to see it gone.
I was trying to work out what had happened.

EDIT: Wait, it looks like it was deleted by a moderator for being in the wrong Board (not entirely unreasonable).  Maybe you're talking about a different discussion you accidentally deleted?
What happened to your comment on the most upvoted Harrowing thread??? I remember seeing it and then I come back and its's gone!

> [{quoted}](name=Altricad,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K8ZE4ved,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-02T15:50:31.878+0000)
>
> What happened to your comment on the most upvoted Harrowing thread??? I remember seeing it and then I come back and its's gone!

I have a feeling Bio might have been a little too free with her words, or at least a little too free in the eyes of a supervisor.  The comments don't show up as deleted, they're just _gone_.  Which is sad.   Try to gently placate a few players, without giving anything at all away?  PUNISHMENT.
You know how fishy that looks right?
That was the one. I thought I had deleted it by mistake somehow and wasn't entirely sure what had happened. Thank you for the reply, that definitely clears things up.

This has now been addressed [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/BAys8miK-did-riot-really-just?show=flat&comment=0017).

Apologies again, but if something does happen like this make sure to post it in the new Player Behavior & Moderation board so the moderation staff can see it right away.

Heya
If you still have the link to it you can reopen it i think.

Edit: Nope does not work, maybe a Mod can do it.

Regards Rkoturdo
